import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import ShoppingCartIcon from "@mui/icons-material/ShoppingCart"; import Drawer from "@mui/material/Drawer"; import List from "@mui/material/List"; import ListItem from "@mui/material/ListItem"; import { useAuth } from "../context/auth"; import { useCart } from "../context/cart"; const Cart = () => { const [auth, setAuth] = useAuth(); const [cart, setCart] = useCart(); const [openDrawer, setOpenDrawer] = useState(false); const handleToggleDrawer = () => { setOpenDrawer(!openDrawer); }; //Delete Cart Item const removeCartItem = (cid) => { try { let myCart = [...cart]; let index = myCart.findIndex((item) => item._id === pid); myCart.splice(index, 1); setCart(myCart); localStorage.setItem("cart", JSON.stringify(myCart)); } catch (error) { console.log(error); } }; return ( <>

Shopping cart

    {cart.map((cart) => (

  • {cart.name}

    {cart.price.toLocaleString("en-US", { style: "currency", currency: "INR", })}

    {cart.color}

    Qty {cart.quantity}

    • ))}

Subtotal

$262.00

Shipping and taxes calculated at checkout.

{auth.token ? ( Checkout ) : ( Log in )}

or

); }; export default Cart;
